channel.title: [562-614] FutureX | Curses | All Skills/Skill Area | Aura [MUST SEE]
channel.description:
[size=14pt]Note: I didn't have time to make pic's, i added FULL Nex, fixed some bugs/glitches and 2 dupe's. Added some other skills to the skill area. Working on Aura's, they give boosts etc., but need to add more aura's.[/size] This is FutureX, have fun guys! Note: No Antileech! File Size: 13.66Mb Download Time: 30Secs-2minutes (Depending on download speed) Source Link: [url=http://www.zakelijkthuis.nl/promotie.php?x=10283]http://www.mediafire.com/?8nqf56anazinc6s[/url] Client Link: [url=http://www.zakelijkthuis.nl/promotie.php?x=10283]http://www.mediafire.com/?extnzmmqjyo[/url] [b]Features:[/b] [code]*New Home *Fixed 90% Nulls *Minigame *Fixed Drop Glitch *Added anti flood *New Donator And Staffzone *some shops.. *Working ::buyfood command! *Fishing 75% *Woodcutting 85% *Hunting 90% *Firemaking 90% *Summoning 85% (Need to add tab) *Crafting 90% *Runecrafting 75% *Mining 95% *Herblore 80% *Prayer 100% (Added Altars) *Fixed Bank Tabs! *Summoning Bank Works! *Removed Quest Tab (Useless) And Added penguin prayers. *Working all normal and skill cape emotes *Working HD *Full Screen *Clan Chat *Friend List Working *Working IpBan :) *Fixed Pm Crowns :) *Censor Working, *Changed Yell Image ;) (no more crown glitches) [/code] Now The Pictures: Fight Pits and High Detail Working! [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/joinnow.jpg[/img] Dedicated Home! [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/home-2.jpg[/img] Chilling Zone 100% [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/chillzone.jpg[/img] Bounty Hunter 100% [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/bh-1.jpg[/img] StaffZone :D I made :) [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/staffzone.jpg[/img] Working all skill menus :) [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t341/bob192_2008/WorkingSkillMenus.png[/img] No more pictures if you wanna see the server download :) To Change your Welcome Text go to:
/Data/Scripts/authentication
And To Remove Welcome Screen Go to ActionSender.java Search for:
sendWindowPane(549, 0);
Under that you see:
sendWindowPane(549, 0); sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378); sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 16); sendString("", 378, 115); sendString("You are connected from: " + player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 116); sendString("0", 378, 39); sendString("0", 378, 96); sendString("", 378, 37); sendString("", 378, 38); sendString("", 378, 94); sendString("Donate for member status.", 378, sendString("Remember to be safe!.", 378, 56); sendString("Updates!", 16, 0); sendString("New Antiflood, No spammers!.", 16, 4);
Just delete it that ;) [b]Credits:[/b] *Rs2Hd *Me :) *google *others

item.description:
@xplode wrote:

[quote=“connerwb, post:13, topic:437359”][quote author=xplode link=topic=540068.msg4020162#msg4020162 date=1339964281]
i changed ips in client.javas but for some reason it still reading your Ip… where do i have to go?
[/quote]
you need to build it i think but i keep getting this error when i do.

keep getting:
src\AppletSub1.java:20:error while writing sub1: bin\Applet_sub1.class
(Access is denied)
public abstract class Applet_Sub1 extends Applet

Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue…[/quote]

i am getting the same error im not sure.

item.description:
@poepen112 wrote:

[size=14pt]Note: I didn’t have time to make pic’s, i added FULL Nex, fixed some bugs/glitches and 2 dupe’s. Added some other skills to the skill area. Working on Aura’s, they give boosts etc., but need to add more aura’s.[/size]

This is FutureX, have fun guys!
Note: No Antileech!

File Size: 13.66Mb
Download Time: 30Secs-2minutes (Depending on download speed)
Source Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?8nqf56anazinc6s
Client Link: http://www.mediafire.com/?extnzmmqjyo

Features:

*New Home *Fixed 90% Nulls *Minigame *Fixed Drop Glitch *Added anti flood *New Donator And Staffzone *some shops.. *Working ::buyfood command! *Fishing 75% *Woodcutting 85% *Hunting 90% *Firemaking 90% *Summoning 85% (Need to add tab) *Crafting 90% *Runecrafting 75% *Mining 95% *Herblore 80% *Prayer 100% (Added Altars) *Fixed Bank Tabs! *Summoning Bank Works! *Removed Quest Tab (Useless) And Added penguin prayers. *Working all normal and skill cape emotes *Working HD *Full Screen *Clan Chat *Friend List Working *Working IpBan :) *Fixed Pm Crowns :) *Censor Working, *Changed Yell Image ;) (no more crown glitches)

Now The Pictures:
Fight Pits and High Detail Working!

joinnow.jpg814×521

Dedicated Home!
home-2.jpg797×534

Chilling Zone 100%
chillzone.jpg805×520

Bounty Hunter 100%
bh-1.jpg800×522

StaffZone I made
staffzone.jpg819×534

Working all skill menus

No more pictures if you wanna see the server download
To Change your Welcome Text go to:

/Data/Scripts/authentication

And To Remove Welcome Screen Go to ActionSender.java
Search for:

sendWindowPane(549, 0);
Under that you see:
sendWindowPane(549, 0); sendInterface(1, 549, 2, 378); sendInterface(1, 549, 3, 16); sendString("", 378, 115); sendString("You are connected from: " + player.getSession().getRemoteAddress(), 378, 116); sendString("0", 378, 39); sendString("0", 378, 96); sendString("", 378, 37); sendString("", 378, 38); sendString("", 378, 94); sendString("Donate for member status.", 378, sendString("Remember to be safe!.", 378, 56); sendString("Updates!", 16, 0); sendString("New Antiflood, No spammers!.", 16, 4);
Just delete it that ;)

Credits:

*Rs2Hd
*Me
*google
*others
